FROM mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/sdk:latest

# Install git, process tools
RUN apt-get update && apt-get -y --no-install-recommends install git procps && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

# Install Node.js and git2semver
RUN curl -f -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_12.x | bash -
RUN apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends nodejs && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN npm install -g git2semver && npm cache clean --force;

# Clean up
RUN apt-get autoremove -y \
    && apt-get clean -y \
    && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

# Set the default shell to bash instead of sh
ENV SHELL /bin/bash
